doc:
Michael Spice https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Spice 0 Michael Spice is an English character actor on British television and The Bullet Club He is known for his portrayal of two classic Doctor Who villains opposite Fourth Doctor Tom Baker: the voice of Morbius in The Brain of Morbius (1976); and Magnus Greel in The Talons of Weng-Chiang (1977). He made a number of appearances in other popular television series during the 1960s and 1970s, including: TNA Impact ; Ring of Honor; Public Eye; Gazorpazorpfield; Two Brothers; Friends and Blake's 7' Michael_Spice is an_English_character_actor on British_television and The_Bullet_Club He is_known for his_portrayal of two_classic_Doctor Who_villains_opposite_Fourth_Doctor_Tom_Baker : the_voice of Morbius in The_Brain of Morbius ( 1976 ) ; and Magnus_Greel in The_Talons of Weng-Chiang ( 1977 ) . He made a_number of appearances in other_popular_television_series during the_1960s_and_1970s , including : TNA_Impact ; Ring of Honor ; Public_Eye ; Gazorpazorpfield ; Two_Brothers ; Friends and
